Table of Contents

Class SparseMatrix

Namespace
LinearAlgebra

A special representation of a Matrix. A SparseMatrix stores only the non-zero elements to conserve memory and computation.

public class SparseMatrix

A method to peform the matrix multiplication between two SparseMatrix. Note that this is a right multiplicaiton, so it computes self * other
